#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    long int t,i,count,len;
    char s[100001];
    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {
        count=0;
        cin>>s;

        len=strlen(s);

        for(i=0;i<len;i++)
        {
            if(s[i]=='T')
                count++;
            else
            if(s[i]=='D')
                count--;

            if(count<0)
                break;
        }

        if(count==0)
            cout<<"YES\n";
        else
            cout<<"NO\n";

    }

  return 0;
}
